definition: relevant/to the point/has sth to do with the matter (also used with negative)
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
to wear (clothes)/to contact/to use/to apply
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
suffix of a noun of locality
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
not to the point/wide of the mark/neither here nor there/irrelevant
irrelevant/can't make head or tail of
erhua variant of 著邊|着边[zhao2 bian1]

sentences.english: The expectation that in these conditions profits will rebound strongly is quite far-fetched.
sentences.chinese: 对于利润率强劲反弹的期待是完全不着边际的。

sentences.english: He doesn't answer my question but be faring off the mark of go around in circles.
sentences.chinese: 他不回答我的问题而是不着边际的兜圈子。

sentences.english: For many traditional academicians, this question might even seem out of place.
sentences.chinese: 对传统学者而言，上述问题完全是不着边际。

sentences.english: That's the end of this installment of ramblings, for the time being at least.
sentences.chinese: 因为时间有限，这一不着边际的部分就到此结束。

sentences.english: We refuse empty ideals and discursive politics.
sentences.chinese: 拒绝空洞地理想，拒绝不着边际的政治。

sentences.english: They talked round for hours without agreeing on anything.
sentences.chinese: 他们不着边际地谈了好几个小时，没有达成任何意见。

sentences.english: The more he talked, the further he strayed from the point.
But the critics have it exactly backwards.
sentences.chinese: 但这种批评完全不着边际。

definition: suffix of a noun of locality
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
continuously/persistently/incessantly
each minding his own business
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/proximity/thread (of ideas, plots etc)/see also 邊|边[bian1]
leisurely/unhurried/sluggish
out/outbound/departing
to pick up (from the ground with one's hands)
to mumble in whispers/to mutter to oneself
to pick up
See you!/Bye!
to gesture/to gesticulate/to practice the moves of a martial art by imitating the teacher/to fight/to come to blows
unhurried/calm/composed/leisurely
in a low voice/(speak) in whispers

to mumble to oneself
